con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-chargeCustomer-Amount-2and4-DP
con:testCase.con:description: Tests view on GUI different amount values with 2 and 4 signs precision (4dp)

con:request.name: subscripManagement_UpdateDDParameter-SetLimitTo-1000EUR
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:updateDirectDebitParameters> <directDebitParameters> <multibrandIds> <multibrandId> <brandId>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-BrandID}</brandId> <tenantId>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-TenantID}</tenantId> </multibrandId> </multibrandIds> <directDebitIntParameter> <name>ON_DEMAND_TOPUP_LIMIT</name> <value>${#TestSuite#TECHNICAL-Limit}</value> </directDebitIntParameter> <directDebitIntParameter> <name>LOW_BALANCE_THRESHOLD_TOPUP_LIMIT</name> <value>${#TestSuite#TECHNICAL-Limit}</value> </directDebitIntParameter> <directDebitMonetaryParameter> <!--type: directDebitParameterNameEnum - enumeration: [GENERAL_DAILY_MAX_AMOUNT,GENERAL_MONTHLY_MAX_AMOUNT,MONTHLY_UNLIMITED_AMOUNT,ON_DEMAND_TOPUP_LIMIT,LOW_BALANCE_THRESHOLD_TOPUP_LIMIT,CHARGE_BACK_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE,CHARGE_BACK_MANDATE_REVOKED,CHARGE_BACK_AMBIGUOUS_BANK_DATA,CHARGE_BACK_OBJECTION,CHARGE_BACK_OTHER,FEE_FREED_CLAWBACK_AMOUNT]--> <name>GENERAL_DAILY_MAX_AMOUNT</name> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <value>${#TestSuite#TECHNICAL-Limit}</value> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </directDebitMonetaryParameter> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <directDebitMonetaryParameter> <name>GENERAL_MONTHLY_MAX_AMOUNT</name> <value>${#TestSuite#TECHNICAL-Limit}</value> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </directDebitMonetaryParameter> <directDebitMonetaryParameter> <name>FEE_FREED_CLAWBACK_AMOUNT</name> <value>${#Project#FEE_FREED_CLAWBACK_AMOUNT}</value> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </directDebitMonetaryParameter> <directDebitMonetaryParameter> <name>MONTHLY_UNLIMITED_AMOUNT</name> <value>${#TestSuite#TECHNICAL-Limit}</value> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </directDebitMonetaryParameter> <chargeBackParameter> <!--type: directDebitParameterNameEnum - enumeration: [GENERAL_DAILY_MAX_AMOUNT,GENERAL_MONTHLY_MAX_AMOUNT,MONTHLY_UNLIMITED_AMOUNT,ON_DEMAND_TOPUP_LIMIT,LOW_BALANCE_THRESHOLD_TOPUP_LIMIT,CHARGE_BACK_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE,CHARGE_BACK_MANDATE_REVOKED,CHARGE_BACK_AMBIGUOUS_BANK_DATA,CHARGE_BACK_OBJECTION,CHARGE_BACK_OTHER,FEE_FREED_CLAWBACK_AMOUNT]--> <name>CHARGE_BACK_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE</name> <!--Optional:--> <SEPAReasonCodes> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <SEPAReasonCode>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE-Code-1}</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>AM02</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>AM03</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>AM04</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>AM06</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>AM07</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>AM09</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>BE01</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>BE04</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>BE07</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>LEGL</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE-Code-2}</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>MD07</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>MS03</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>NARR</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>NOAS</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>RR01</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>RR02</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>RR03</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>RR04</SEPAReasonCode> </SEPAReasonCodes> <!--type: int--> <fee>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE}</fee> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </chargeBackParameter> <chargeBackParameter> <name>CHARGE_BACK_MANDATE_REVOKED</name> <SEPAReasonCodes> <SEPAReasonCode>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_MANDATE_REVOKED-Code-1}</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_MANDATE_REVOKED-Code-2}</SEPAReasonCode> </SEPAReasonCodes> <fee>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_MANDATE_REVOKED}</fee> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </chargeBackParameter> <chargeBackParameter> <name>CHARGE_BACK_AMBIGUOUS_BANK_DATA</name> <SEPAReasonCodes> <SEPAReasonCode>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_AMBIGUOUS_BANK_DATA-Code-1}</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>AC06</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>AC13</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>AG02</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>AM01</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>AM05</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>AM10</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>ARDT</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>BE05</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>BE06</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>DT01</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>ED05</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>FF01</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>FF05</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>FOCR</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>MD03</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>NOOR</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>PY01</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>RC01</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>RF01</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>SL01</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>TM01</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>MD04</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>ED03</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_AMBIGUOUS_BANK_DATA-Code-2}</SEPAReasonCode> </SEPAReasonCodes> <fee>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_AMBIGUOUS_BANK_DATA}</fee> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </chargeBackParameter> <chargeBackParameter> <name>CHARGE_BACK_OBJECTION</name> <SEPAReasonCodes> <SEPAReasonCode>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_OBJECTION-Code-1}</SEPAReasonCode> <SEPAReasonCode>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_OBJECTION-Code-2}</SEPAReasonCode> </SEPAReasonCodes> <fee>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_OBJECTION}</fee> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </chargeBackParameter> <chargeBackParameter> <name>CHARGE_BACK_OTHER</name> <fee>${#Project#CHARGE_BACK_OTHER}</fee> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </chargeBackParameter> <directDebitThresholdList> <thresholdValue> <value>400</value> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </thresholdValue> <thresholdValue> <value>500</value> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </thresholdValue> <thresholdValue> <value>1000</value> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </thresholdValue> <thresholdValue> <value>1500</value> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </thresholdValue> <thresholdValue> <value>2000</value> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> </thresholdValue> </directDebitThresholdList> <!--type: validationCycleTypeEnum - enumeration: [DAILY_FIX_START_00,MONTHLY_FLEX_START_30_DAYS,MONTHLY_FIX_START_1]--> <monthlyValidationCycle>${#TestSuite#LIMIT-ValidationCycle-Flex-30}</monthlyValidationCycle> </directDebitParameters> </cus:updateDirectDebitParameters> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: SELECT CONTENT FROM SEPA_FILE_CONTENT WHERE CONTENT LIKE '%${#TestCase#MSISDN}%' AND CONTENT LIKE '%pain.008%' ORDER BY ID DESC

con:configuration.content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.008.001.02" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.008.001.02 pain.008.001.02.xsd"><CstmrDrctDbtInitn><GrpHdr><MsgId>*</MsgId><CreDtTm>${#Project#Date_Current_yyyy-MM-dd}*</CreDtTm><NbOfTxs>5</NbOfTxs><CtrlSum>20.00</CtrlSum><InitgPty><Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-AccountName}</Nm></InitgPty></GrpHdr><PmtInf><PmtInfId>RCUR*</PmtInfId><PmtMtd>DD</PmtMtd><NbOfTxs>5</NbOfTxs><CtrlSum>20.00</CtrlSum><PmtTpInf><SvcLvl><Cd>SEPA</Cd></SvcLvl><LclInstrm><Cd>CORE</Cd></LclInstrm><SeqTp>RCUR</SeqTp></PmtTpInf><ReqdColltnDt>*</ReqdColltnDt><Cdtr><Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorName}</Nm><PstlAdr><Ctry>DE</Ctry><AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorStreet}</AdrLine><AdrLine>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorCity}</AdrLine></PstlAdr></Cdtr><CdtrAcct><Id><IBAN>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-IBAN}</IBAN></Id></CdtrAcct><CdtrAgt><FinInstnId><Othr><Id>NOTPROVIDED</Id></Othr></FinInstnId></CdtrAgt><ChrgBr>SLEV</ChrgBr><CdtrSchmeId><Id><PrvtId><Othr><Id>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-CreditorID}</Id><SchmeNm><Prtry>SEPA</Prtry></SchmeNm></Othr></PrvtId></Id></CdtrSchmeId><DrctDbtTxInf><PmtId><EndToEndId>*</EndToEndId></PmtId><InstdAmt Ccy="EUR">4.00</InstdAmt><DrctDbtTx><MndtRltdInf><MndtId>${#Project#Customer-MandantID}</MndtId><DtOfSgntr>${#Project#Date_Current_yyyy-MM-dd}</DtOfSgntr></MndtRltdInf></DrctDbtTx><DbtrAgt><FinInstnId><Othr><Id>NOTPROVIDED</Id></Othr></FinInstnId></DbtrAgt><Dbtr><Nm>bankAccountOwner</Nm></Dbtr><DbtrAcct><Id><IBAN>${#Project#Customer-IBAN}</IBAN></Id></DbtrAcct><UltmtDbtr><Nm>ultimateDebtor</Nm></UltmtDbtr><RmtInf><Ustrd>*${#TestCase#MSISDN}*(ultimateDebtor). O2 SAGT DANKE</Ustrd></RmtInf></DrctDbtTxInf><DrctDbtTxInf><PmtId><EndToEndId>*</EndToEndId></PmtId><InstdAmt Ccy="EUR">4.00</InstdAmt><DrctDbtTx><MndtRltdInf><MndtId>${#Project#Customer-MandantID}</MndtId><DtOfSgntr>${#Project#Date_Current_yyyy-MM-dd}</DtOfSgntr></MndtRltdInf></DrctDbtTx><DbtrAgt><FinInstnId><Othr><Id>NOTPROVIDED</Id></Othr></FinInstnId></DbtrAgt><Dbtr><Nm>bankAccountOwner</Nm></Dbtr><DbtrAcct><Id><IBAN>${#Project#Customer-IBAN}</IBAN></Id></DbtrAcct><UltmtDbtr><Nm>ultimateDebtor</Nm></UltmtDbtr><RmtInf><Ustrd>*${#TestCase#MSISDN}*(ultimateDebtor). O2 SAGT DANKE</Ustrd></RmtInf></DrctDbtTxInf><DrctDbtTxInf><PmtId><EndToEndId>*</EndToEndId></PmtId><InstdAmt Ccy="EUR">4.00</InstdAmt><DrctDbtTx><MndtRltdInf><MndtId>${#Project#Customer-MandantID}</MndtId><DtOfSgntr>${#Project#Date_Current_yyyy-MM-dd}</DtOfSgntr></MndtRltdInf></DrctDbtTx><DbtrAgt><FinInstnId><Othr><Id>NOTPROVIDED</Id></Othr></FinInstnId></DbtrAgt><Dbtr><Nm>bankAccountOwner</Nm></Dbtr><DbtrAcct><Id><IBAN>${#Project#Customer-IBAN}</IBAN></Id></DbtrAcct><UltmtDbtr><Nm>ultimateDebtor</Nm></UltmtDbtr><RmtInf><Ustrd>*${#TestCase#MSISDN}*(ultimateDebtor). con:configuration.query: SELECT * FROM ( Select C.ID, C.TOPUP_ID, C.END_TO_END_ID, C.REMITTANCE_INFORMATION From CAMT05400102_INPUT_ENTRY C Where C.DRC_STATUS!='CREDIT_FAILED' Order By C.ID DESC) WHERE RowNum<=1

con:request.name: GUI-Service-paybackCamt054Transaction
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:paybackCamt054Transaction>\r <!--type: long-->\r <camt05400102InputEntyId>${DataSource-GetIDsFromCAMTFiles#ID}</camt05400102InputEntyId>\r <!--type: string-->\r <comment>Test: Return amount with pain001 file. MSISDN is not assignable.</comment>\r </v1:paybackCamt054Transaction>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: SELECT CONTENT FROM (SELECT * from SEPA_FILE_CONTENT ORDER BY ID DESC) WHERE CONTENT LIKE '%${#TestCase#MSISDN-Unknown}%' AND CONTENT LIKE '%pain.001%' AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY ID DESC

con:configuration.content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.001.001.03" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.001.001.03 pain.001.001.03.xsd"><CstmrCdtTrfInitn><GrpHdr><MsgId>*</MsgId><CreDtTm>${#Project#Date_Current_yyyy-MM-dd}T*</CreDtTm><NbOfTxs>4</NbOfTxs><CtrlSum>40.00</CtrlSum><InitgPty><Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-AccountName}</Nm></InitgPty></GrpHdr><PmtInf><PmtInfId>PAYMENT*</PmtInfId><PmtMtd>TRF</PmtMtd><BtchBookg>false</BtchBookg><NbOfTxs>4</NbOfTxs><CtrlSum>40.00</CtrlSum><PmtTpInf><SvcLvl><Cd>SEPA</Cd></SvcLvl></PmtTpInf><ReqdExctnDt>*</ReqdExctnDt><Dbtr><Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-AccountName}</Nm></Dbtr><DbtrAcct><Id><IBAN>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-IBAN}</IBAN></Id></DbtrAcct><DbtrAgt><FinInstnId><Othr><Id>NOTPROVIDED</Id></Othr></FinInstnId></DbtrAgt><ChrgBr>SLEV</ChrgBr><CdtTrfTxInf><PmtId><EndToEndId>*</EndToEndId></PmtId><Amt><InstdAmt
